name: La Luz
description:
La Luz is a small third-person puzzle game made for the Winter ICT Game Jam. (https://ictgamejam.itch.io)

This game was built over a weekend by a team of four: Salina Williams, Clay Gonzales, Samantha Cosgrove and Kelly Johnson.

Keyboard Instructions:

WASD to Move

Left and Right Arrows to Rotate

Space To Jump

(Hit 'P' if you get stuck)

Controller Instructions:

Left Stick to Move

Bottom of the Main Buttons to Jump

Left and Right Trigger to Rotate

(Down D-Pad if you get stuck)
